links_reviews_text: I liked the color and sleeves a lot, but the neck was too tight, the length was too short for my 6-month pregnant belly, and the material was too itchy for me. If you're not sensitive to sweaters and like the feminine lines, try it! I wanted to love it but just wasn't comfortable in it.
The fabric of this is wonderfully soft and the color is beautiful. The puffy sleeves give this a little flare. Great for work or casual night out.

I love the fabric, the color, and the sleeve detail, but heads up -- this top runs very small. I ordered the XL to be safe and could see before putting on that it was very small. I might have tried to carry it off... but the turtle neck was also tight and restrictive feeling. Sadly, never wore.
This was cute - all in all a simple turtleneck with a little extra flare in the puffy sleeves. I wore a few times to work.
love the sleeve; fit was very form-fitting for me
Loved this. Good for dressing up and down
Cute with a skirt, dressy pants, or jeans! Very versatile top.
If only the neck wasn’t so tight! It was super restricting. Super bummed because it could have been so cute if it wasn’t so tight
Considered buying because it was so versatile, comfortable, and fit perfect!

I really like this shirt. It runs a tad small (I have a long torso) but works well tucked into high waisted work pants. Professional but fun, I received a lot of compliments on it and could definitely wear outside of work!

This seems like a more boring piece but it’s a great staple to wear with more eccentric pieces. I wore it mostly with a patterned Nuuly skirt I got in the same shipment or with jeans and big fun earrings. The shoulder puffs give it some flare so it doesn’t feel that ordinary and a size small was perfect for tucking into jeans. Highly recommend!
I love this sweater! It looked really cute with jeans or under a jumper I got in my nuuly box with it! Was able to wear it a few times. Love the sleeves
I don’t like super tight things around my neck so this was a little uncomfortable. Otherwise cute.
Its a rich color, adorable puff sleeves, very fitting but flattering at the same time.
The sleeves were a little puffier than expected, and it was a bit too short for me
I think sizing on this top is off. The neck was way too tight, it felt suffocating. Too bad because it’s a lovely shade of red.
Runs small and also a weird material
This top is so much fun by itself, layered, etc. Very easy to wear!

If you want a comfy fall/winter staple this is it. The color, material and fit are spot on. The puff sleeve is a nice touch without being over the top. I would have preferred it to be a tad longer on my long @ss torso but it wasn't really too short either, this is just a personal preference.
The turtle neck is a little high and tight but otherwise loved wearing it. Into the shoulders

This was a perfect quarantine cozy sweater. I wore w/ leggings or shorts generally! I have a long torso so it wasn’t too long on me, would probably order a medium if I ordered again to have a larger look but the small fit well still!
I wore this a lot with leggings, which it is great for. It is pretty warm. Nothing crazy special about it but is as pictured and made for a good cozy outfit.
Perfect for winter. a nice big neck and baggy to wear with leggings. Wore this a ton when I rented it and knew I just had to buy it!

This sweater is the perfect oversized turtle neck! I wore it a ton during the winter because it was so easy to throw on. My only complaint is it's not as comfy as it looks! The fabric is very itchy. Not unbearable, but definitely was a bummer!

I wore this quite a few times! The collar is massive of course, but it looks nice bunched up, and has a slouchy, casual vibe. While soft, it definitely feels like that "fake" knit feel, and it captured every single hair and fiber in the world. I could see this pilling like crazy after more wears, so I didn't purchase. Just didn't seem like something that would last years, and that's what I want out of a sweater I'm going to buy. However, for a Nuuly? Absolutely add it to your next one!!
Nice oversized sweater that I wore a lot. Matches with everything and love the oversized feel of it. Didn't end up buying because the material started to fray a bit.
Loved it- perfect sweater to throw on with jeans or satin skirt. Always looks effortlessly chic

links_reviews_title: Exactly what you want from a black turtleneck sweater!
links_reviews_text: I loved this and bought it! Based on the reviews I sized down to XS, and it fit perfectly as a slightly oversized comfy sweater. Super soft and the turtleneck isn't suffocating. Highly recommend for a staple black sweater.
Whats not to love! Cozy & a little oversized! Perfect for a winter-y weather with a jacket or spring weather without one. Loved wearing this item
It's definitely oversized, but that's what I was hoping for. The neck is big but very cozy. Overall I was pretty pleased with this sweater and may end up keeping it.
Was fun for the snow. A lot of material on my neck. Size down
It was the perfect oversized look. I wore this more times than I can count, and when I wasn't wearing it my roommate was!
Oversized but still looks fashionable of pairing with skinny/slim bottoms. So cozy!
I absolutely loved this sweater. It was incredibly versatile. I loved that I could throw it in w leggings and booties and it felt a little dressier. It was so cozy too!
Honestly I wore this too much. So cozy but also very cute!
This sweater was amazing. So soft and comfy. I could have gotten a smaller size, it runs a bit large. Didn't matter thought since it is an oversize sweater
So big, so comfy, just the best. I ended up keeping it.

Loved the style and fit of this sweater but my lord, the neck was so huge and bulky! There was so much material and it didn’t quite hang low enough. Felt like I was trying to keep my head above water the whole time. Wore it more like a sweatshirt on the way to swim practice than a sweater to go out. Just too bulky
I love this oversized sweater paired with leggings so much for the winter I bought it! A cozy, closet staple
Such a cute sweater with a large neck and perfectly oversized fit.
Comfortable and amazing. Large fit, but I tucked it into some leggings and it was really cute. I want this sweater for keeps!
Runs large, I'm 24 weeks pregnant and almost always wear a M when not pregnant, I ordered this in a Small and was glad I did, still plenty of room and super cozy.
I didn’t want to ever take it off! So cosy and went with so much more than I was expecting
Super oversized, but I like it that way. Perfect black and perfect softness. I got so many compliments. It’s the end of winter but I’m thinking of buying it!
I actually wore this as a dress to work with tights because even the small was very long for me.
This is the sweater I've been looking for all winter! If it had been available on Nuuly in the fall I would have purchased it. Perfect oversized comfy sweater
Cool fit, great look.

I sized down on this from previous reviews which I'm glad I did! It was cozy and warm, I paired it with leggings and flats for work. Of course like any other thing black it attracts ever fuzz ball. It was in good shape.
The turtleneck was much large than I anticipated but very cute! I got a lot of compliments in this sweater and its quite warm.

links_reviews_title: Super cozy, almost like a dress
links_reviews_text: This sweater is so, so cozy. It's quite long, perfect over leggings for a casual day or over tights for a semi-nice outfit.

Oversized is one thing, but I looked like I was wearing a circus tent. Not just giant, but a giant box shape. Unworn. Side note: the knit also has stretch to it. You could put four girls in this and have them all wear black leggings and it would make a nice spider costume.
Loved how big the neck cowl was, it was super comfy like a big cloud. I got an XS and it was still very roomy.
Love this sweater and I get so many compliments. I love big clothes but I'd actually size down.
I love this and I'm wearing it as we speak

Gorgeous color, super soft and cozy. However, it fits like a bag. and the S/M is super oversized. I tried to make it work (french tuck, belt, whatever...) but it was just too unflattering for my shape to walk out the door in. Bummer!

The orange color was more like a halloween orange compared to the orange in the photo. The material stretches easily and just looks loose and worn. Wore it only once and don't plan on wearing it again.
Pretty color. Nice and warm
Fits as expected
I wanted to like it, but the print underneath made it look kinda like a trashy beach shirt.
This is a perfect shirt to wear on a night out. It is made out of a really nice fabric and just feels glamorous overall.
I really liked this shirt. I live in LA so the palm tree design was really fun. I loved the sheer back. Fit pretty true to size, if not a little big?
Got tons of compliments on this shirt at work! The back is all just mesh see-through, and the front in the palm tree print under the mesh. So cool
Cool button-up and fits great!

links_reviews_title: Cute but too tight at waist
links_reviews_text: Adorable jeans, but high and no stretch so I couldn’t zip them. I wore them anyway with a loose top.
So very cute, I wish they had fit. They are 100% cotton, absolutely no stretch to them and on top of that they were comparable to pants a size smaller.
I received a ton of compliments in these jeans. Good for a casual Friday. They were fairly long on me, so I had to roll them a few times. Hi rise with a roomy leg.
I would potentially size up 2 in these, they run super small. Couldn't get the size 27 to zip!
Runs large- wore to work a lot, paired w/ navy and trench coat. Got lots of compliments!
Wanted to wear this shirt more but was very baggy! Size down or two
This cropped sweater is too heavy and bulky.
The reviews are true, this is a boxy fit. But I just french tuck mine into high waisted jeans and voila! Perfection. I love the design and how thick it is. Definitely keeping this one!
Was super boxy and not soft. Had to wear another shirt under it

I loved this in the photos and was so excited to wear it, but as soon as I pulled it out of my bag, I realized it wasn't gonna happen lol. The knit is double layered so the sweater is really stiff and has no drape, and the shoulders made me look like a linebacker. I tried it on, had a laugh, and put it back in my bag for the rest of the month. The pattern and colors were super pretty though, I just wish it had been less bulky so it were more flattering!

links_reviews_title: Cute fun addition to work week!
links_reviews_text: A little bit cropped and wide but still a cute flattering fit. Super warm.

I should have trusted the reviews, but I really loved the pattern on this! It is really really thick, in a weird way. It felt like wearing a very stiff comforter. I live in Chicago and run really cold, and I think I would be warm in this. Because it was so stiff and I have broader shoulders, I felt like a linebacker in this. It was not a flattering look.
I love the look of this sweater, but it is VERY thick and was too stiff for my liking. It made me feel really wide and bulky on top. Might be good for very cold climate?
Very warm and stylish sweater. I wore with black jeans and converse.

I wore this sweater a ton! It's interesting, comfy and looks/feels like a luxury item. I sized up for an oversized feel but it ended up fitting me normally. Always received a compliment when worn---it went great with skinny jeans and loved how it paired with leather pants.
It was really cute and great for spring but the seams are totally itchy
Not the colors I usually wear but was cute
Super cute on
As other reviewers said, the material is stiff and strange. It just didn’t look quite right on me. The shoulders were too large and not flattering.
The pattern was so pretty but the fabric was stiff, not what I was expecting. The bow was huge and didn't look right. Wish it could have worked!
Received all sorts of compliments on this when I wore it to work. It looked great with a skirt and I even wore it with a black romper and it was perfect.
Definitely an interesting shirt. Between the flowers and the bow tie it was a little on the futsy side, but not in a bad way? Just in a way that you have to own it when wearing.
This was my favorite top I’ve ordered! Got so many compliments. Fabric is stiffer than shown in photos.

Not one to wear for a full-day at the office, but definitely cute for a night out. It's sadly just too itchy of a fabric, and the fabric is also why it's such a great piece - it's sturdy enough that it makes the pussy bow very easy to tie and keep propped up.

The colors and pattern were great. However, the material was thin and rough. No stretch to it and the overall fit of the shirt was short. I tried it on but couldn't bring myself to wearing the stiff shirt. Would not recommend.
So cute!! One note: it has buttons where you don’t need them and no buttons where they should be: aka the boob part
This top for really well, and was very comfortable. I got so many compliments on this top.
People LOVED this top! So did I. The fabric is a bit scratchy, but it didn’t bother me. I could see if your skin was sensitive, it’d be an issue
This is a pretty top. The bow and print are exactly as pictured. Keep in mind, fabric is a bit on the stiffer side.
Really loved the pattern & bow tie. It runs a little short—would probably be good with a high-waisted pant. Very sheer, so need a cute camisole. The material felt crunchy.
I loved how this looked in photos but in person it was way too big, and the material felt like scratchy plastic. It was a swing and a miss for me!
Great fit and fun colors. Got a ton of compliments from my boss and senior management at work!
Love the print, but it was the most uncomfortable, itchy, sweaty synthetic material.
This shirt was perfect for work. It‘a made of taffeta so it was a little stiff, but it helped the sleeves hold a nice shape. The colors are beautiful!
I wore this with another Nuuly piece. It was cute and fun but it was super itchy at every seam. This was such a fun piece to dress down.
Coloring in person was more muted than the photo. Not meant for anyone with a bust making it too small

links_reviews_title: Pretty blouse just not soft to skin
links_reviews_text: The blouse visually looks beautiful with cool green, black and muted red tones. There are so many ways to make an outfit with it. I tried it on with a black cami underneath, dark denim and a cardi. I was going to wear it to work but the blouse material was stiff, not quite soft to the skin. I didn’t think I could handle wearing it all day. I would probably consider renting it again when the weather is warmer and have an occasion to be a little more dressed up than usual.
A little stiff Loved it for work!
Loved these! so fun, had to buy.

These pants were fine. They fit well, but had a kind of looser fit in the legs that made me feel frumpy, even in a leopard print. Still- wore them with a black sweatshirt and it was a perfectly ok outfit.
Love these and wore them alot. Could've sized down because they did stretch with one wear.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable but wish my legs were longer
links_reviews_text: The high waist and relaxed fit were super comfy. The wide cropped leg was not the most flattering for someone with shorter legs like myself. I paired them with a tank and my ankle hiking boots.
I sized up from my usualy 26 and the 27 was perfect. I would definitely these if they were a little less expensice. but im happy renting them :) get these!!
I love these!! Gonna rent one side up next month and prolly buy!!!
These fit me perfectly. They look very thick, but are an awesome light-weight jean fabric. They are very flattering and are tight in the waste.
As someone who has a bigger booty and a smaller waist. These literally fit my body like a dream!!! I’ve never had jeans fit me so well. If I could’ve afforded to keep them I would’ve!

Super cute and perfect to rent. There a little more bold than a regular pair of jeans so if I bought them I’d either a) get sick of them or b) feel like people would notice me wearing them a lot. As such a perfect Nuuly rental!
Cute jeans that I wouldn't buy but great for 2-3 wears.

I'm usually between a 27 or 28, and I got a 28 and it was too tight. Technically I could button it, but sitting would have been very uncomfortable, and definitely felt a denim camel toe creeping up even while standing. I was disappointed because I was so excited for these cute pants. If you want them, I would size up at least one full size.
I absolutely loved these jeans and wore them as much as possible. Would have bought them if they weren't so expensive.
These jeans are so chic. Every time I have worn them I get compliments. They fit really well and I’ve styled it with a crop top, a sweater, a tank etc

Loved these! Very versatile jeans! I wore them on multiple occasions and always got compliments. I was able to pair them with a sweater and boots and with a tank top and sneakers for another occasion.
They fit great, loved the quality, the high waist, the color. Felt so confident in these. :)
These jeans are so flattering and fun! They are comfortable and fit nicely. I love the 90's vibes they bring
I'm between a 26 and 27 and the 26's were too tight...fit but I couldn't breathe. I'm 5'2" about 120 lbs.

links_reviews_title: Tight in the waist and crotch
links_reviews_text: Fit very tightly in the crotch. A little uncomfortable for me!
Love these but they run big!! I am going to order a size down and see if they fit better.
To be fair, I have big legs and a smaller waist, so typically a 26 would fit my waist but be tight in the legs. I should’ve sized up. But I didn’t and couldn’t even pull them over my hips.
Fit so well through the waist and thighs, but omg they were at least four inches too long.

These have no zipper and button all the way up which I do not enjoy personally. I usually wear a 27 and I got a 28. They fit but were pretty snug. They're definitely high-waisted which I love and cute with pretty much anything, but they were not comfortable jeans.
I ordered a size 26 and couldn’t get these past my thighs. I’m usually between a 26-27 but would maybe even need a 28 in these. Pretty bummed because they seem to be adorable

links_reviews_title: Cute, less structured than I thought
links_reviews_text: Never got a chance to wear this, but liked it! Wish it had more structure to be less like a bath robe.
The color and the pattern are cut. Just didn't fit well anywhere and was not cosy.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful but not the greatest color for my skin tone
links_reviews_text: I love this jacket because I'm a lover of quilts. It has a wonderful fit and is made very nicely. I wasnt crazy about the color on me and wish they sold it in another colorway. The sleeves are wide at the hand so I did have some trouble when trying to cook with this on but it looks cute when cuffing the sleeves too. This is a great item to throw on in the mornings and wore it a lot this month while social distancing.

This is a great, unique piece! It's super soft and great for layering with jeans and a tee. I tied the belt around the back, so the front was left open. Ultimately this piece is one of the reasons I signed up for Nuuly—good for a couple wears but not something i would wear enough to justify the cost of a full purchase.
I wore this with skinny jeans, fitted T and my Dr. Martens Jadon. The next day I wore them with Nike black joggers and wheat Timberlands. Seriously thinking about buying it.
Great jacket. Wore a few times.
This oversized Kimono was so soft and cozy.
Great piece to try out and fit great!

I loved this jacket! it was a boxy fit, but worn with a tight turtleneck underneath it could still be flattering. Wore multiple times to work, dinner, and out with friends and got a ton of compliments. Very easy to throw on with blue or black jeans!
The ruffles on the sleeves look a little different from the pictures! Not as controlled, and a little messy looking. I liked the color, but never found an outfit to wear this with.

I love this jacket sooooo much! I am struggling with the idea of returning it!! Normally with jackets I tend to size up, they tend to run small and I have never tried on anything from this brand before. Good thing I did cause the XL fits perfect. It is so cute and true to color, ugh I love it so much, perfect for spring. I mostly wore it with jean and a tucked in shirt that went well with purple. Def reccommend!
I looove a statement jacket. this was really cute. i liked the unique color a lot. I wore it many times and would like to rent again! this is a great jacket for spring!
I love oversized, but this was very unflattering. The color and ruffle details are unique, but the boxy fit throws this off. There’s no smaller size than xs.

links_reviews_title: Super Cute - Runs Big in the Shoulders
links_reviews_text: I absolutely LOVED this twist on the denim jacket! It runs a little big though so it was too boxy to wear with certain things- particularly in the sleeves and shoulders. I could have easily sized down and still worn it over a long sleeves.

This was the perfect jacket to spice up ANY outfit. I wore to an evening event with denim and a black top. I also wore it casually to dinner one night with yoga pants and tennies. I got so many compliments 😍

It's quite warm, yet making very edge look in this jacket. Could be looking too strong or too much but that's what makes women feel confident! I styled it with baggy pants and Dr.Martens! Size is true to small.
Definitely a cropped fit but fits great! so cute
I wore this with some high waisted black pants and got a lot of compliments. I have small shoulders and it fit me perfectly.
Perfect little jacket to spice up a plain black work outfit
I loved this jacket. It runs a little big.

I love this and will definitely rent again. I'm 6 months pregnant and wore it over a tight black top and low-rise maternity jeans. Got so many compliments and had fun wearing it to work. I thought I would wear it more over dresses but I didn't get to it this time around.
Wore it with the matching pants and got lots of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Cute but not a good look on me...
links_reviews_text: I made the mistake of pairing with the pants, and I looked like I was in a boy band. Not worth it!

Styled with green Corduroys, black lace top and black boots. Will also look great with jeans (there some blue threading). Goes from day to evening well. Very flexible and comfortable. Back is especially beautiful. Decided to buy. Will wear this a lot!
Such a cute piece to help dress up jeans and a top or wear over a dress. Only wore a couple of times but loved it so much I decided to keep. Very flattering fit.
Fit as expected, really great look and cut! Would buy

Rented this during COVID stay home mandates, it was my favorite pick! It does kind of look like a bathrobe on a Zoom call, but I love it so much I didn't care. A must if you love Captain Picard's off-duty style.
I love this! It’s so beautiful, I wish i could afford to own this. Has a lovely vintage feel

I loved the way the colors and patterns of the fabric were mixed together on this coat. It looked very well made, expensive and unique. I wore it with a black tank top underneath and black jeans. I think in colder weather it would look good with a turtleneck. I have an hourglass figure and used the sash to make the shape less boxy, but it isn't really meant to be a sexy or form-fitting top. It looked very sophisticated and I wish I had more opportunities to wear it.
I wanted to make this work, but I just couldn't pull it off without it looking like a costume.

I LOVED this jacket. It was the perfect item to have during transitional weather since it was warm enough in the cold with a jersey turtleneck, but not too warm in the heat. Would have bought if it wasn’t so much $$$. Obsessed and trying to order another color in my next box.

I never thought I'd be into wearing a kimono (longer ones felt like a bathroom on my petite frame), but this one is SO great. Perfect length and just overall a really fun piece. FYI, the stripes are metallic (is that the word I'm looking for?) and add a little sparkle which I am not mad about.

This jacket is so pretty and the subtle hints of metallic lurex made it extra special. I wore it tied with a plain tee underneath for that kimono look with black crop flare jeans and black doc martins. I liked that I could also wear it untied like a true jacket for a different look. It’s quilted but not too thick, so easy to layer underneath a heavier jacket for colder weather.
I loved this jacket - I ended up wearing the tie as a belt through my jean loops and wore the kimono as an open style.
I tried, but I never felt comfortable in this. It felt boxy and I didn’t like the way it fit in the armpits. It’s quality material though. I think it just wasn’t for me.
Really great fit and length

links_reviews_title: Loved this jacket and got a ton of complements.
links_reviews_text: Easy throw on jacket that didn't make me feel sloppy. Loved pairing with earth tones or a graphic T - was very versatile.
I love how thick the shearling in this coat is. It was slightly oversized, and very warm.
1x fits like a 3x at least. Is not soft, feels cheap, but I guess that’s expected from polyester.
A great piece for early spring weather. Warm in the morning but not sweating when I left work. Definitely size down as it was very big in the shoulders.

This jacket was nice and warm - definitely ran large but that’s the look. I do think you could probably size down one size. This was fun and different to wear for a month! I will say the zipper is INTENSE because of the weight of the fabric beware skin or hair around it!
Very warm bomber but in plus sizes, it looks less like a bomber shape and more like a basic sherpa fleece. Meh.
This was cute, but it was huge on me compared to the other 1X sized things in my box.
Really great oversized fit, very warm

I got SO many compliments on this puffer coat, and wore it all the time - it's super comfy and while I usually wouldn't go for a pink coat, it's muted enough that it works well. I brought it on a ski trip for walking around the resort or heading to evening drinks, and good for walking around the city. It's warm enough for 30-40 degree weather, but would not recommend for any climate colder than that.

This coat was pretty huge, but aren't all puffers kind of supposed to be? Even though I looked like a pink marshmallow, I still wore it and loved it because it's so cozy. The coat is pretty heavy and feels very substantial. Very warm and just overall feels like a very nice, quality jacket. It's getting warm here so there's no need for me to have it any longer, but it was just what I needed to get through the lingering cold days of spring.

I thought this was going to be a cute, lighter weight, pink coat, but it was so puffy and heavy I felt like that kid in A Christmas Story. There was no way I could wear it. This is definitely not for in between weather - I would only get think about wearing this in 30 degree / freezing weather.

I loved this coat. I received many compliments. It is extremely warm, which is great for very cold days. I rented it close to spring so some days I over heated easily in this coat and had to take it off. Great midwinter coat!

I could see myself living in this puff. Southern CA got a little too hot by the time it arrived though. This is a very warm jacket and I couldn't really get use out of it BUT I respect her pastel corduroy beauty and wish her the best life.
I LOVE this jacket. I got so many compliments every time I wore it. The only reason I give it 4/5 instead of 5/5 stars is that it was a little large on me. Otherwise, it was super warm and adorable.
Fits true to size, super cute and soft!

This jacket is so cute and was a near perfect fit (sleeves were a tough long so I just rolled them up and it was still really cute) I am so tempted to buy this! The details on it make it so unique and you can tell it’s well made. Can’t rave about this jacket enough. Lightweight, perfect for spring. Definitely get this if you’re on the fence!
Once I ironed it, it was perfect. I wore it mainly to work with black pants and black shirt. The piping on it adds a great detail, and the shape is very flattering. Easy to dress up or down.
Wore it to work, looks the right amount of casual + put together. It is thin though
Fit as expected, stretchy waistband and very lightweight
The material is very soft yet structured and I really loved the tailored yet casual look Will rent again
Great coat! Weather turned and got warm right when it arrived so didn't get to wear it.
Great men's wear cut, silky lining
I loved this but the weather warmed up right when I got it. Would have worn a lot weather permitting!

So this jacket is really cute but the yellow was much brighter in person than I expected. Definitely size down and know the color is extra bright and saturated in person. It's a cute coat just not for me.

This was your average sweater that was comfortable and in such a nice pink color. It is a little cropped, but it worked for me since I’m 5’2”.

Good quality. For my body, it fit a bit tight in the butt and thighs. I'm not super curvy so it was surprising
